item.title: [MAHOUT-1258] Another shot at findbugs and checkstyle
item.description: We should have a shot at findbugs and checkstyle before the upcoming 0.8 release.
item.summary: Another shot at findbugs and checkstyle

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
